analysis.description:
ITradeableAsset (/unique_chucks/20/0xb42ce9d2a22061b7d5e569753f92edbaa2dad37b.sol#6-15) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/20/0xb42ce9d2a22061b7d5e569753f92edbaa2dad37b.sol#11-12)

Exchanger.depositTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0xb42ce9d2a22061b7d5e569753f92edbaa2dad37b.sol#106-112) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (/unique_chucks/20/0xb42ce9d2a22061b7d5e569753f92edbaa2dad37b.sol#110-112)
Parameter '_token' of Exchanger. (/unique_chucks/20/0xb42ce9d2a22061b7d5e569753f92edbaa2dad37b.sol#84-85) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_weight' of Exchanger. (/unique_chucks/20/0xb42ce9d2a22061b7d5e569753f92edbaa2dad37b.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_formulaContract' of Exchanger. (/unique_chucks/20/0xb42ce9d2a22061b7d5e569753f92edbaa2dad37b.sol#86-87) is not in mixedCase
